subtitles.voice-bot: Voice AI like a real operator

labels.monthlyNote: Monthly service: 5% + your actual API provider costs.

modal.ctaText: Ready to start? Contact us for a consultation and requirements specification.

ai-audit.title: AI Business Audit
ai-audit.description: Comprehensive analysis of your company's business processes to identify automation opportunities using artificial intelligence. Get a detailed roadmap for implementing AI solutions.
features: Analysis of up to 20 business processes

chatgpt-consultant.title: ChatGPT Consultant Implementation on Website
chatgpt-consultant.description: Smart chatbot based on ChatGPT, trained specifically for your product and knowledge base. Automates up to 80% of typical customer questions and works around the clock.

request-automation.title: Application Processing Automation
request-automation.description: Complete automation of incoming application processing using AI. The system automatically sorts, analyzes, and responds to customer requests.

marketing-generator.title: Marketing Text Generator
marketing-generator.description: Powerful neural network for creating sales texts, advertising materials, and content for social networks. Saves up to 70% of time on content creation.

image-generation.title: Advertising Image Generation
image-generation.description: Creative neural network for creating unique advertising images and banners. Generates hundreds of creative options in different styles, saving up to 80% of the design budget.

accounting-ai.title: AI for Accounting
accounting-ai.description: Complete automation of accounting processes using AI. The system automatically categorizes operations, fills out documents, and reconciles reports, reducing errors by up to 99%.

cold-mailing-ai.title: AI for Cold Mailings
cold-mailing-ai.description: Intelligent system for creating and sending personalized cold emails. Increases open rates by 3x and response rates by 5x through AI-powered personalization.

competitor-analysis.title: AI Competitor Analysis
competitor-analysis.description: Automated analysis of competitors' strategies, pricing, and marketing activities. Get insights and recommendations to stay ahead of the competition.

sales-analytics.title: AI Sales Analytics and Demand Forecasting
sales-analytics.description: Advanced analytics system for sales forecasting and demand planning. Predicts sales trends with 95% accuracy and optimizes inventory management.

telegram-whatsapp-bot.title: AI Bot for Telegram/WhatsApp
telegram-whatsapp-bot.description: Smart chatbot for Telegram and WhatsApp that handles customer inquiries, orders, and support. Integrates with your CRM and works 24/7.

online-courses-ai.title: AI Assistant for Online Courses
online-courses-ai.description: Intelligent assistant for online learning platforms that helps students with questions, provides personalized recommendations, and tracks progress.

crm-ai-assistant.title: AI Assistant for CRM
crm-ai-assistant.description: Smart assistant integrated with your CRM system that automates data entry, provides insights, and helps with customer relationship management.

ai-recruiter.title: AI Recruiter
ai-recruiter.description: Intelligent recruitment system that automates candidate screening, resume analysis, and interview scheduling. Reduces hiring time by 60%.

social-content-ai.title: AI Social Media Content Selection
social-content-ai.description: Neural network for selecting and creating engaging content for social networks. Analyzes trends and generates viral content ideas.

document-processing.title: AI Document Processing
document-processing.description: Automated document processing system that extracts information, categorizes files, and generates summaries. Handles any document format with 99% accuracy.

reputation-management.title: AI Review and Reputation Management
reputation-management.description: Intelligent system for monitoring and managing online reviews and reputation. Automatically responds to reviews and tracks sentiment analysis.

ai-transformation.title: Complete AI Company Transformation
ai-transformation.description: Comprehensive AI transformation package that includes strategy development, implementation, and training. Transforms your entire business with AI solutions.

call-analytics.title: Call Speech Analytics
call-analytics.description: AI-powered call analytics system that analyzes conversations, identifies key topics, and provides insights for improving customer service quality.

voice-bot.title: AI VoiceBot for Calls
voice-bot.description: Advanced voice AI that handles incoming calls like a real operator. Natural conversation, appointment scheduling, and customer support automation.

custom-gpt.title: Custom GPT for Your Business
custom-gpt.description: Personalized GPT model trained specifically for your business needs. Handles industry-specific tasks and integrates with your existing systems.
